Package org.sontana

Class AbstractScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.AbstractScene
  • public abstract class AbstractScene
extends java.lang.Object
    AbstractScene objects represents different game stages.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon

      • initialiseScene

        public final void initialiseScene()
                           throws org.minueto.MinuetoFileException
        Command method for when an AbstractScene is initialising. Do not call this method normally.
        Throws:
        org.minueto.MinuetoFileException - if broken file paths exist within the scene.
